Reviews.Title: Nikon d3200 24.2
Reviews.Author: pamelaneeley
Reviews.Content: I only have used it a couple time the quality not as good as I thought it would be..Even with sport pictures I am still getting some blur... As far as handling yes it does and a great weight.. not sure if I will keep it or sale it out... not really to happy with it..

Reviews.Title: Just bought this bunle, and ITS AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Karl Yaeger
Reviews.Content: I just bought this bundle, seeing as it was much cheaper than buying the camera and accessories seperately. Received it within 2 days with my Prime account, just set up everything up and turned on for first time. Everything that it states is in the package is, plus the battery/charger which it technically doesnt mention. Everything came well packaged, in great condition. Its easy to set up, even without reading the directions thoroughly. The camera itself looks awesome, definitely a stand out product. This is my first camera, based on suggestions from friends who are in photography, and im positive im going to love it!

Reviews.Title: Great deal.
Reviews.Author: Gerard J. Carriera
Reviews.Content: Wonderful deal and top notch value for the price. All accessories included were very good quality and just the right things to get me started in the wonderful world of digital photography.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Candace Glover
Reviews.Content: This package is excellent. I'm extremely happy with it & would recommend any new photographer to purchase it.  They're are very few extra accessories that you will need to purchase too be professionally set after this purchase. Thanks Focus Camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Michael C.
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent for getting started in photography. The accessories are great too. Everything is as described. The only thing I need to add is that it includes a battery and wall charger that were not in the original listing, a bonus that should be listed. Awesome deal. You get your money's worth and more.

Reviews.Title: Great photos & options.
Reviews.Author: Sunflower "Associate Broker"
Reviews.Content: I'm a Real Estate Broker who needs to take excellent photos of my listings. The photo's have to be perfect and they are with this camera. The wide angle lens takes a great pic encompassing a lot of the room. The only reason I gave it 4 stars & not 5 is the camera is a little heavy & the lens is a little large when the camera is swinging around my neck. I do love it and the Red is stunning. People always comment on the color. Like a red Corvette!

Reviews.Title: The lens
Reviews.Author: Ivan C.
Reviews.Content: I received the camera on 05/20/13 and yesterday May 25 after taking about 200 pictures the automatic zoom stopped working. Besides that issue the camera is exciting and I am not going to give up on it, I will ask the seller to replace the not working zoom lens.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: broken_seven7
Reviews.Content: I absolutely adore my new camera! This bundle is everything I was hoping for and more!!! I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: great dea
Reviews.Author: thomas spears
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present for my wife . I had one picked out a different one the same only in black but with two lenses the buyer had all off the sudden ran out and told me they could refund my money or I had to wait three weeks after Christmas I was out raged I called amazon witch they always treaded me with respect and put my mind at ease . I have found this deal witch came with quit a bid my daughter takes photography at school she is a senior at least she understands this is a great deal amazon made sure I got the present before Christmas all I can say the fun both are having with this camera is priceless thank you amazon for helping me out once again

Reviews.Title: I still don't know how to use all the bells and whistles of the camera.
Reviews.Author: Feral Sirensong
Reviews.Content: However, it's really easy to use as a point and shoot.  You can be taking pictures in five minutes.I bought a book to help me figure out just what this sucker can do.  The video that comes with it doesn't really cover it.

Reviews.Title: Happy with camera, but external flash in package does not work
Reviews.Author: Arnie Weller
Reviews.Content: I was happy with the camera and all of the additional equipment except for the external flash.  It did not function no matter what I tried.Otherwise, the value and the quality were very good.  The shipping, however, got caught up in the holiday rush and was delayed by several days.  This was not the shipper's fault - it was the fault of the package delivery service used.

Reviews.Title: everything and more
Reviews.Author: M. Brandt "king of the garage"
Reviews.Content: With this package. you can't get any better. It has everything you need to start taking beautiful pictures. I would highly recommend it to everybody.

Reviews.Title: New to advanced Camera's
Reviews.Author: Jessica Carter
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get something that could do more and take better quality pictures than a normal digital camera. At first I was afraid because there is so many settings and attachments. I still have a lot to learn but I am still able to take professional pictures with little knowledge of all the settings. I love it!! I have captured so many moments with my child who just turned one and family events. The shutter setting is one of my favorites for my child and the dog. It is easy to hook to the computer and take the pictures off of it and if your willing to learn the camera has options to teach you.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jossie
Reviews.Content: It's just perfect, it was as expected and as described in the picture. No complains so far. It works great.

Reviews.Title: Just right for a beginner
Reviews.Author: SHERRY JONES
Reviews.Content: Everything for someone just beginning in photography. Camera gives the best of digital with a tad mix of a true SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera package deal
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: After shopping around this was the best deal with lots of accessories.  Shipment was fast and even quicker then promised and nice pscking

Reviews.Title: The camera and lens are great everything else is garbage.
Reviews.Author: SkiOne
Reviews.Content: I struggled with how many stars to give this product since the D3200 is a fantastic camera with great features and quality. Also the provided kit lens is a very good deal. However everything else is garbage! Save yourself the money and buy each piece individually. The only thing I am using is the UV filter but how bad can you screw that up really? Oh and I use the photo bag but is not that good to be honest.

Reviews.Title: Very good product !
Reviews.Author: Beatriz S.
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, takes high definition pictures !Preferred that all items were Nikon branded (bag, lens were not Nikon)

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: KD
Reviews.Content: I Love this Camera and everything that came with it. This is my pride and joy and the red steals the show. Great pictures, user friendly and all the bundle stuff made it feel like Christmas. I would buy this over again, and I just might for a spare!

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 14 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body (Red) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens (Black) - Bower SFD728N Fully Automatic TTL Flash - Telephoto & Wide Angle Lens Set
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap - 52mm UV Protection Filter - Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Red) with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR NIKKOR Zoom Lens + Automatic TTL Flash + Telephoto & Wide Angle Lenses + 10pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
